src:
They said what?! Pros react to Kevin Lee’s head kick KO, Derrick Lewis’ win at UFC 244
03 Nov 2019, 03:09 by Lucas Rezende



First, Kevin Lee derailed one of lightweight’s hottest prospects after starching Gregor Gillespie with a powerful head kick in the first round. Afterwards, Derrick Lewis edged out Blagoy Ivanov in a close affair at UFC 244. On Twitter, pro fighters reacted to both bouts.

Blagoy Ivanov vs. Derrick Lewis







































































Kevin Lee vs. Gregor Gillespie
